answerText: Vaclav Havel [10] Havel wrote most of his works in this nation, and served as its final president, before it split into two different nations in 1993.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Editors 2 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: He wrote of Josef Gross's attempts to get the title document translated in The Memorandum. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this playwright who wrote about Hugo Pludek's encounters with members of the Liquidation Office in The Garden Party.
